Uporabljamo tudi zapis
focusses, focussing
in
focussed
.

sense.def:
To focus a camera
pomeni naravnati fotografski aparat tako, da posname jasne slike.

Kadar je fotografija ali teleskop
in focus
, je fotografija ali tisto, kar gledamo, jasno in ostro. Kadar pa je fotografija ali teleskop
out of focus
, je fotografija ali tisto, kar gledamo, nejasno ali zamegleno.

seg.quote: The only part of the picture which was in clear focus was a small child.

sense.def:
To focus one's eyes
pomeni naravnati oči tako, da jasno vidimo.

To focus a ray of light
pomeni usmeriti žarek svetlobe proti določeni točki.

seg.quote: I focused the beam of the spotlight on them.

sense.def:
To focus one's attention on something
pomeni osredotočiti se na nekaj.

The focus of interest or attention
je nekaj, čemur namenjamo posebno pozornost.

seg.quote: Changes in the urban environment are the focus of public interest and discussion.
